NoCloudManualMIoTCommandAction.description: The MIoT command to perform (e.g.: get_properties, set_properties, action)

siid.description: Service ID of the command. Allowed values: 1 to 99999.

piid.description: Property or Action ID of the command. Allowed values: 1 to 9999

value.description: Required for commands that write/update/set something and optional for actions
